titles.title: A resolution amending the Standing Rules of the Senate to require inflationary impact statements in committee reports.
A resolution amending the Standing Rules of the Senate to require inflationary impact statements in committee reports.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: This resolution amends the Standing Rules of the Senate to require each Senate committee report to contain an analytical statement as to whether, and the extent to which, the increased budget authority, outlays, or revenue produced by the enactment of the bill or joint resolution into law may have an inflationary impact on prices and costs in the operation of the national economy or the purchasing power of low- and middle-income families.
